item.title: 使用 Python and Keras 构建一个简单的神经网络
item.description: 本文翻译自 A simple neural network with Python and Keras 1. 使用 Python and Keras 构建 一个简单的神经网络 🔗在开始之前，我们先快速复习一下当前最通用的神经网络架构：前馈网络。 我们接下来将

item.title: 在 Mac OS X 上安装 Opencv3 (Python3.5)
item.description: 通过 homebrew 安装 opencv 🔗通过 homebrew 安装在 Mac OS X 上安装为 Python3.5 安装 Opencv3： $ brew install opencv3 --with-python3 ...... ...... This formula is keg-only, which means it was not symlinked into /usr/local. opencv3 and opencv install many of the same files. Generally there are no consequences of this for you. If you
